definition: Ngawa county (Tibetan: rnga ba rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan

sentences.english: Wenchuan forms part of the  prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 汶川是阿壩州的一部分。

sentences.english: Education of pastoral areas is an important component of the ethnic education in ABa Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 牧區教育是阿壩州民族教育的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Hongyuan:Hongyuan is the only complete grassland farming county in A Ba which is Tibet's habitation.
sentences.chinese: 紅原紅原是阿壩州唯一的以藏族聚居爲主的純牧業縣。

sentences.english: Benidick : Next week, I will lead a production unit to A-Ba in SiChuan province.
sentences.chinese: 下週一我將帶領一個攝製組駕車前往四川阿壩。

sentences.english: Aabar was not just interested in space tourism.
sentences.chinese: 阿壩不只對太空旅行感興趣。

sentences.english: Vocational education in Aba State faces great opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 阿壩州職業教育面臨着發展的大好時機。

sentences.english: The party's ethnic policies are the primary motivation for the development of Aba prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 黨的民族政策是阿壩州經濟社會發展的根本動力。

sentences.english: Parts of the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau and the Hengduan Mountains extend to its territory.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原和橫斷山脈的一部分延伸到了阿壩境內。
